Plot: Terrence Malick's adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.
Title: The Thin Red Line
Actors: Nick Nolte, Jim Caviezel, Sean Penn, Elias Koteas
tomatoConsensus: The Thin Red Line is a daringly philosophical World War II film with an enormous cast of eager stars.
Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 20 wins & 41 nominations.
